verses.verse: I will praise <S%H3034><s%> you with my whole heart <S%H3820><s%>: before the gods <S%H430><s%> will I sing praise unto you <S%H2167><s%>.

I will worship <S%H7812><s%> toward your holy <S%H6944><s%> temple <S%H1964><s%>, and praise <S%H3034><s%> your name <S%H8034><s%> for your lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and for your truth <S%H571><s%>: for you have magnified <S%H1431><s%> your word <S%H565><s%> above all your name <S%H8034><s%>.
In the day <S%H3117><s%> when I cried <S%H7121><s%> you answered <S%H6030><s%> me <S%H7292><s%>, and strengthened me with strength <S%H5797><s%> in my soul <S%H5315><s%>.
All the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> shall praise <S%H3034><s%> you <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord, when they hear <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H561><s%> of your mouth <S%H6310><s%>.
Yes <S%H7891><s%>, they shall sing in the ways <S%H1870><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: for great <S%H1419><s%> is the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
Though the Lord <S%H3068><s%> be high <S%H7311><s%>, yet has he respect <S%H7200><s%> unto the lowly <S%H8217><s%>: but the proud <S%H1364><s%> he knows <S%H3045><s%> afar off <S%H4801><s%>.

Though I walk <S%H3212><s%> in the middle <S%H7130><s%> of trouble <S%H6869><s%>, you will revive <S%H2421><s%> me <S%H7971><s%>: you shall stretch forth your hand <S%H3027><s%> against the wrath <S%H639><s%> of my enemies <S%H341><s%>, and your right hand <S%H3225><s%> shall save me <S%H3467><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will perfect <S%H1584><s%> that which concerns me <S%H2617><s%>: your mercy, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, endures for ever <S%H5769><s%>: forsake <S%H7503><s%> not the works <S%H4639><s%> of your own hands <S%H3027><s%>.
